resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158403</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158403</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2929</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Home</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Haus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Maison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A HOME</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Sede</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η "Οικία"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Hogar</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A list of links to sites withactivities and games to learn vocabulary related to the home</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Liste der Links zu den Site-withactivities 
und -spielen, zum des Wortschatzes zu erlernen stand auf dem Haus in 
Verbindung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une liste de liens aux withactivities et aux jeux
de sites pour apprendre le vocabulaire a associé à la maison</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma lista das ligações aos withactivities e aos
jogos dos locais para aprender o vocabulário relacionou-se à HOME</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una lista dei collegamenti ai withactivities ed 
ai giochi dei luoghi per imparare il vocabolario si è riferita alla 
sede</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας κατάλογος συνδέσεων με τα withactivities και τα
παιχνίδια περιοχών για να μάθει το λεξιλόγιο αφορούσε το σπίτι</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una lista de conexiones a los withactivities y a 
los juegos de los sitios para aprender vocabulario se relacionó con 
el hogar</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>
            <source>statusValues</source>
            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education
n:Israel Ministry of Education
org:Israel Ministry of Education
end:vcard</entity>
            <date>
              <dateTime>2009-02-20</dateTime>
            </date>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>

            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2929</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

            <entity>begin:vcard
version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education
n:Israel Ministry of Education
org:Israel Ministry of Education
end:vcard</entity>
            <date>

            </date>
          </contribute>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>

          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="en">9-14</string>
            <string language="x-t-lre">9-14</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <context>

          </context>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>

            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Amit schools</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>427</id>
              <entry>
                <string language="en">English language</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>

            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>508</id>
              <entry>

            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>158403</entry>

    <name>

    <item>
